name: ChristmasCountdown
0:
”Alexa, ask Santa Countdown how long until Christmas”
”Alexa, ask Santa Countdown how many days until Christmas”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa countdown
des: This is just a little skill that tells you how many days until the next Christmas. It can be prompted using the keyword 'Santa Countdown', which makes it fun for all. Be sure to check for the special message on Christmas day!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
